mapper.select: select * from t_shose w ,p_brand b ,p_material m ,p_origin o ,p_style s where w.b_id = b.b_id and w.m_id = m.m_id and w.o_id = o.o_id and w.s_id = s.s_id and w.sh_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_shose set sh_image = #{image},sh_image1 = #{image1},sh_image2 = #{image2},sh_image3 = #{image3} ,sh_image4 = #{image4},sh_image5 = #{image5},sh_image6 = #{image6},sh_image7 = #{image7},sh_image8 = #{image8} where sh_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_shose w ,p_style s where w.s_id = s.s_id order by w.sh_id Desc limit #{start},#{over}

select * from t_shose w, p_style s where w.b_id in (select b_id from p_brand where b_des = #{styleDes} ) and w.sh_type = #{type} and w.s_id = s.s_id order by w.sh_id desc limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}
select count(w.sh_id) from t_shose w where w.b_id in (select b_id from p_brand where b_des = #{styleDes} ) and w.sh_type = #{type}

select * from t_shose w LEFT JOIN p_style s on w.s_id = s.s_id where 1 = 1
and w.sh_des like concat('%', #{shose.des}, '%')
or w.sh_title like concat('%', #{shose.title}, '%')
or w.sh_function like concat('%', #{shose.function}, '%')
order by w.sh_id Desc limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}

select count(sh_id) from t_shose where 1 = 1
and sh_des like concat('%', #{des}, '%')
or sh_title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
or sh_function like concat('%', #{function}, '%')

select count(w.sh_id) from t_shose w LEFT JOIN p_brand b on w.b_id = b.b_id LEFT JOIN p_style s on w.s_id = s.s_id where 1 = 1
and w.sh_type = #{type}
and w.b_id = #{brandId}
and w.sh_price <= 240
and w.sh_price >= 240 and w.sh_price <= 350
and w.sh_price >= 350 and w.sh_price <= 550
and w.sh_price >= 550 and w.sh_price <= 950
and w.sh_price >= 950

select count(w.sh_id) from t_shose w where 1 = 1
and w.b_id = #{brandId}
